name: Phantom Frame
description:
Created for 7DFPS Jam 2022.  A rogue-lite first person shooter in the vain of Vampire Survivor. Fend off waves of enemies with your camera, gain upgrades, and see if you can make it till the end of the night.

Controls:

WASD - move

Mouse - aim

Left Click (Hold) - aim.

Credits:

Programming: Jose Pacio, Zach Lindblad

Music: "Cognitive Dissonance" Kevin MacLeod
